title: The Havoc We Wreak
description: An Enemies to Lovers College Bully Romance The final part of Caiden and Winter's story...Secrets and lies are being revealed. Loyalties are being tested, and betrayal cuts deep. My mother needs to be stopped, but at what cost? At the end, who will be left standing? And... Who Will Fallâ€¦ Eeny, meeny, miny, mo. You underestimated the Four and Snow. You thought you were on a winning streak. But are you prepared for the havoc we wreak? Note - this book is not a standalone, and should be read after The Secrets We Hide
author: Becca Steele
